script.dialog: If you've never met me before, you should |C3|trade|C0| something with Frozen Veyeral.
You've met her at least, right?
Anyways, I'm here to tell you about |C3|The Towers.
You'll find 2 new types of gifts here.
|C3|Blessings|C0| will help you just like power gifts do, but they wear off after a number of battles.
|C3|Burdens|C0| always have harmful effects, but they also only last a few battles.
Most monsters will give you both |C3|Blessings and Burdens|C0| at the same time, so be careful.
There is also another important rule for The Towers.
Monsters will only gain levels if you earn high scores in battles.
Performing well against higher level monsters will quickly increase the level.
Other than that, you should know that some towers are still missing their final battles right now.
But they will be added soon enough.
